local_intent: Detect the green bin lid, move above it, then approach and finely align to the lid handle (tolerance 0.005) and verify arrival.
assumptions: Handle is reachable once above the lid
0.1m vertical offset is safe around the bin and table
Vision can detect the lid within three attempts
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT approach phase using DetectObject with retry, MoveAbove, then ApproachAndAlign to 'green_bin_lid_handle' with the same tolerance/timeout, finishing with an IsAt verification.
